sentences.sentence: Welcome, friend! Welcome to the Old Market Magical Curio shop!
sentences.translation: 欢迎，朋友！欢迎来到旧货市场的魔法古玩店！

sentences.sentence: A cooked-up replacement would be the monetary equivalent of Esperanto — an artificial curio.
sentences.translation: 人为造出一种替代货币就像是货币领域的世界语(一种“古董”似的人造语言)。

sentences.sentence: It began as a curio item on an obscure maritime website and grew into the mystery of the summer.
sentences.translation: 它开始只是某家名不见经传的海事网站上刊登的一件不让人注意的小事，继而演变成今年夏季的一个迷团。
